rules_text:
When you cast Servants of Dydren, return all other creatures named Servants of Dydren from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Servants of Dydren gets +2/+2 for each other creature you control named Servants of Dydren.
flavor_text:
[i]“Ah, the servants. We refer to ‘em as the ‘eternally stubborn' — no matter how many hundreds we kill, there always seems to be a thousand more of ‘em.”
— Bamdo Brond[/i]
